channel.title: Need help with this error, please!
channel.description:
How come I get this error when I click on run
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:45) Press any key to continue . . .
How can I fix it ?

item.title: Need help with this error, please!
item.dc:creator: @ar959 ar959
item.description:
@ar959 wrote:

Thanks Coder Xynt you helped me alot.

Read full topic
